snippet.title: Super Mario Apocalypse (2021) | RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
Following the same formula SM64DS-style as the original, Super Mario Apocalypse features 100 brand new stars, improved levels and soundtrack and more quality of life updates all put together in this action-paced remake. This game's difficulty is balanced for casuals, beginners and super players who are into challenging kaizo.

Download (v1.4 - with instructions and setup): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dR2lT8C0fPIGTYd3hM63J6Cskq5Qb6i0/view?usp=sharing
Console compatible version: UNDERWAY

Soundtrack video and dev playthrough coming soon! (+ extra bonus content!)


---

Finally, 3 entire years of working on this project marks my third ROM hack recreation in my fangame career. It also celebrates the 3-year anniversary of the ROM hack since the official release in December 2018.

A huge thank you to everybody involved who supported me through this long and eventful journey, and, I wouldn't make it happen without the man himself: LouderMonkeyBoy!

His channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/Loudermonkeyboy

Trailer music by EDark:
https://www.youtube.com/c/EDark

---

::: Keep crashin'! :::

|| Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/lincrash 
|| The Big C: https://discord.gg/XewDxfH

---

♪ Background music: 

Aquarius - Castlevania III: Dracula's Curse
Irate Eight (Tension) - Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze
Mario's Ranks - Super Mario Kart

Music copyrighted by Konami, Nintendo and Retro Studios.
